The high-speed TGV from Paris goes to Rennes. Switch to the regular-speed SNCF train to Vannes.  NOTE: the main train
is not marked Vannes. You can also take the TGV from Paris to Quimper which makes a stop in Vannes without switch.
Vannes can be reached directly from Nantes or Brest by taking the highway N165. From Rennes, take the N24 and switch at PloÃ«rmel to the N166. These roads are free.
